hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jabir said:“Asma’ bint ‘Umais gave birth to Muhammad bin Abi Bakr and sent word to the Prophet (ﷺ). He told her to take a bath, fasten a cloth around her private part and begin the Talbiyah.”

chapter.eng-name: Women who are bleeding following childbirth and menstruating should enter Ihram for Hajj
